required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 In Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled, Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics of Hemay005 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Hemay005 is a novel phosphodiesterase type 4(PDE4) inhibitor being developed for the treatment of psoriasis. A total of approximately 24 subjects will be randomized into 3 cohorts(15mg, 30mg, 60mg), approximately 8 healthy subjects will be enrolled (6 active and 2 placebo) at each dose cohort. This study includes an 28-day Screening Period, a 1-day single dose and 7-days multiple doses Treatment Period, and an End of Study Visit occurring approximately 11days (±3 days) after study drug administration.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of adverse events and serious adverse events.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 hours post-dose on day 1 and day11

secondary_outcome.measure: area under the curve from time zero to the last quantifiable concentration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 hours post-dose on day 1 and day11
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to the last quantifiable concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: area under the curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 hours post-dose on day 1 and day11
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre-dose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 5, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 hours post-dose on day 1 and day11

arm_group.description: 6 subjects in each cohort(15mg, 30mg, 60mg) will receive Hemay005
2 subjects in each cohort(15mg, 30mg, 60mg) will receive placebo

intervention.description: Subjects will be randomized into 3 dose groups orally twice daily.
Subjects will be randomized into 3 dose groups orally twice daily.
